entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reference binding doesn't work on iOs #14577
  • OnPlatform & AppThemeBinding dynamic values not being utilized in controls #14575
  • Border control display bug in a Grid (Windows) #14573
  • WinUI: TabbedPage pages provided by a DataTemplate crash when swapping to a different tab. #14572
  • CarouselView position ignored #14569
  • SearchBar IsEnabled property not functioning #14566
  • DEP0700: Registration of the app failed. [0x80080204] error 0xC00CE014: App manifest validation error: The app manifest must be valid as per schema #14564
  • Entry Layout broken after Update .NET MAUI to 7.0.81 #14562
  • Android FlyoutPage problems when FlyoutPage::Flyout is a NavigationPage. #14561
    Backlog
  • Slow build -> deploy on iOS #14560
  • Secondary Order ToolbarItems not displayed correctly on iOS #14559
  • Custom Shell.TitleView content not positioned correctly on iOS #14558
  • CollectionView Header & Footer not showing in Windows #14557

Closed

  • Build error when using some packages on Android #10152
    Backlog
  • Memory leak while repeatedly navigating between pages #10578
    Backlog
  • Shell flyout items are displayed multiple times - if async added by code #12233
    Backlog
  • WinUI app reads out $"{Window.Title} Window DesktopChildSiteBridge" when using narrator #10131
    Backlog
  • Disable web security in BlazorWebView #14433
  • Maui Android: If keyboard is on the page scroll not working #14548
  • [Bug] Picker title text is not screen reader accessible #1186
    .NET 8 Planning
  • DatePicker Focused, UnFocused not working as expected #12899
    Backlog
  • [Android] VerticalStackLayout inside of ScrollView doesn't center #14418
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Button/ImageButton's Border has a default value on Windows #9871
    Backlog
  • Maui blazor 7.0.81 Windows Error #14525
  • Root pages in flyout custom title view out of bounds (iOS) #14386
  • Additional KeyboardFlags #3851
  • Can we integrate a DataTemplate with Drawable view? #3956

PullRequests

Created

  • Support both Update and Include for maui #14576
  • Fix android border stroke to use dp vs px #14574
  • Add Xceed partners #14571
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Normalize the orientation from MediaPicker photos #14568
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Add Controls.Compatibility to local cache #14567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] [Android] Properly remove the Frame's border thickness #14565
    area/controls 🎮, control-frame

Merged

  • readme spelling correction #14556
    area/docs 📓, community ✨
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `CollectionView` #14329
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.3.230228005-preview1 to 1.3.230331000 #14563
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Properly remove the Frame's border thickness #14551
    backport/suggested, backport/approved
  • [iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md to include information about solution files #14553
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 7.0.4 to 7.0.5 #14541
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • [net7.0] Make MAUI into a workload based on NuGet packs #14331
    area/setup 🪄
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Tests] Move sample build test to IntegrationTests #14499
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Dont propagate nav event if not appeared #14552
    area/navigation 🧭
  • Strong name the build tasks for the IDE #14080
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • [Android] Fix Entry issues with Keyboard using IsPassword #14382
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • Added ICommandMapper for extension methods #14545
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [xaml] fix x:Array and x:Double in Release mode #14546
    area/Xaml </>, backport/suggested
  • Switch to AppWindowTitleBar From SetTitleBar #14517
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Use Background as Fill, if Fill is null in Shapes #14216
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Windows] Update CollectionView changing ItemsLayout #14532
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Make Benchmarks.Droid runnable as APK for perf testing #14447
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Propagate Navigation Events through PageContainer #14523
